description: Beesia deltophylla, commonly known as Beesia, is an amazing plant species. It has an urban-toughness combined with stunning beauty. It's a low-maintenance flowering evergreen which is perfect for gardens, rockeries, or rock walls. Its gray-green crinkle foliage has a velvet-like texture and small, fragrant yellow-green flowers appear in spring. Beesias tend to form an attractive clump, and they are hardy to various climates and thrive in well-drained, slightly acidic soil. With its evergreen leaves and low-maintenance needs, Beesia is a great choice for all gardeners, from beginners to horticulturists.
